transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. You can ride me to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 I take lots of children to one place
🛑 I stop to let people on and off
💛 I am often yellow

transport.question: I fly in the sky and can take you far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird
✈️ You need a ticket to ride on me
🌍 I travel between countries

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people or things. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a toy duck.
🚢 I travel on the ocean
⚓️ Pirates use me

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 👟 You wear a helmet when riding me.
🚲 I help you exercise
🔔 I have a bell that you can ring

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can carry lots of people. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a 'choo choo' sound.
🛤️ I follow a special road made of metal
💺 I have carriages where you can sit

transport.question: I'm big and strong, and carry heavy loads. What am I?

hints.text: 🚧 I have a very loud horn
📦 I deliver things to shops
🚚 I am bigger than a car.

transport.question: I have two wheels and an engine, and you wear a helmet to ride me. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I go faster than a bicycle.
🛵 I am smaller than a car.
🏍️ Some people call me a hog

transport.question: I can fly straight up, and have blades that spin around on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can land on buildings.
🚨 I am sometimes used for emergencies.
🌪️ My blades go 'whop whop whop'.

transport.question: I travel under the ground and help people get around cities quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 You go down stairs to reach me.
🔦 It's dark where I travel.
🎫 You need a special ticket to ride

transport.question: I travel to outer space. I am very fast and tall. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I need special fuel to take off.
🧑‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
✨ I go to the moon and the stars

ocean.question: I'm big and blue and fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I have waves.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not a fast animal.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squirt ink.
💦 I live under the sea.
🖐 I have many arms

ocean.question: I’m a fish with a very flat body. Sometimes I shock!

hints.text: 🥞 I'm shaped like a pancake.
⚡ I can give you a zap!
🌊 I live at the bottom of the ocean.

ocean.question: I'm a very big mammal that lives in the ocean and spouts water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am very large.
🗣 I can make singing sounds underwater.
⛲ I blow water out of a hole on my head.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell, two big claws, and walk sideways. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I can pinch you.
🚶I move in a funny way
🏜️ I live near the ocean or on the beach.

ocean.question: I am a very long, thin fish that looks like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I don't have scales like most fish.
🔦 Some of my family can give off light.
🕳 I hide in rocks.

ocean.question: I’m a colorful, spiky creature found on the sea floor, and I can sometimes hurt if you step on me!

hints.text: 🟣 I come in lots of colors.
⭐ I can be round.
🪸 I live near coral.

ocean.question: I'm a very big and dangerous fish with lots of sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 Some of my family are known as Great Whites.
🐟 I eat other fish.
🩸 I have a bad reputation.

ocean.question: I’m a huge underwater structure made of tiny animals that live in warm, shallow water. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 Many colorful fish live near me.
🪨 I'm made of limestone.
☀️ I need sunlight to grow.
